pageTitle: AI Video Generator - Create Videos from Text
pageDescription: Transform your ideas into stunning videos with AI. Multiple models, various durations and aspect ratios. Professional video generation in minutes.
heading: AI Video Generator
subheading: Create stunning videos from text descriptions using the latest AI models
title: Generate Video
promptPlaceholder: A majestic lion walking through a golden savanna at sunset, cinematic lighting, slow motion...
pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a few minutes
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this video?

errors.promptRequired: Please enter a prompt to generate video
errors.insufficientCredits: Not enough credits. Please purchase more credits.
errors.generationFailed: Video generation failed. Please try again.
errors.timeout: Generation timed out. Please try again.

fast.title: Fast Generation
fast.description: Generate professional quality videos in just a few minutes with our optimized AI pipeline.

models.title: Multiple AI Models
models.description: Choose from PixVerse, Kling, Veo and more. Each model offers unique strengths for different styles.

quality.title: High Quality Output
quality.description: Up to 1080p resolution with smooth motion and cinematic quality. Perfect for professional use.

script.title: AI Script Generator
script.heroSubtitle: Create professional video scripts for TikTok, YouTube, ads and more. Just describe your topic and let AI write the perfect script.
script.topicPlaceholder: e.g., 5 morning habits for productivity, product demo for new smartphone, how to make perfect coffee...
script.notesPlaceholder: Any specific requirements, keywords to include, or style preferences...
script.feature1Desc: Optimized scripts for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, long-form videos, ads, tutorials and more.
script.feature2Desc: Get a complete, ready-to-use script in seconds. No more writer's block.
script.feature3Desc: Generate scripts in English, Polish, Spanish, French and more.

errors.topicRequired: Please enter a topic for your video

voiceover.title: AI Voiceover Generator
voiceover.heroSubtitle: Transform your text into natural-sounding speech with multiple voices, languages, and speed options. Perfect for videos, podcasts, and presentations.
voiceover.textPlaceholder: Type or paste the text you want to convert to speech. The AI will generate a natural-sounding voiceover with your selected voice and settings...
voiceover.feature1Desc: Professional voices in English, Polish, Spanish, French, German and more languages.
voiceover.feature2Desc: Get high-quality voiceovers in seconds. No recording equipment needed.
voiceover.feature3Desc: Adjust speed, choose from multiple voices, and preview before downloading.

errors.textRequired: Please enter at least 10 characters to generate voiceover

captions.title: Auto Captions Generator
captions.heroSubtitle: Automatically transcribe audio and video files with AI. Get accurate subtitles in SRT, VTT, or JSON format. Supports 12+ languages.
captions.dropOrClick: Drop file here or click to browse
captions.feature1Desc: Powered by Whisper large-v3, the most accurate speech recognition model available.
captions.feature2Desc: Supports English, Polish, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and more.
captions.feature3Desc: Export as SRT, VTT, JSON, or plain text. Compatible with all video editors.
captions.urlWarning: Direct audio/video file URLs only (mp3, wav, mp4, etc.). YouTube, Vimeo, and TikTok links are not supported - please upload the file instead.

errors.fileRequired: Please upload an audio or video file
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 100MB.

lipsync.title: AI Lip Sync
lipsync.heroSubtitle: Automatically synchronize lip movements in videos to match any audio track. Perfect for dubbing, voiceovers, and content localization.
lipsync.dropVideo: Drop video here or click to browse
lipsync.dropAudio: Drop audio here or click to browse
lipsync.processingMessage: Lip sync is being processed. This may take a few minutes...
lipsync.signInToGenerate: Sign in to use Lip Sync
lipsync.feature1Desc: Advanced AI precisely matches lip movements to your audio for natural-looking results.
lipsync.feature2Desc: Dub videos into any language while maintaining natural lip movements.
lipsync.feature3Desc: Get your lip-synced video in minutes, not hours. Professional quality output.

errors.videoRequired: Please provide a video file or URL
errors.audioRequired: Please provide an audio file or URL
errors.videoTooLarge: Video file is too large. Maximum size is 50MB.
errors.audioTooLarge: Audio file is too large. Maximum size is 20MB.
errors.processingFailed: Lip sync processing failed. Please try again.
errors.timeout: Processing timed out. Please try again with a shorter video.

avatar.title: AI Talking Avatar
avatar.heroSubtitle: Generate realistic talking avatar videos from text or audio. Perfect for presentations, marketing videos, and educational content.
avatar.textPlaceholder: Type or paste the text your avatar will speak. Keep it natural and conversational for the best results...
avatar.dropAudio: Drop audio file here or click to browse
avatar.dropImage: Drop image here or click to browse
avatar.imageHint: Upload a face image for custom avatar
avatar.processingMessage: Avatar video is being generated. This may take a few minutes...
avatar.signInToGenerate: Sign in to generate avatar videos
avatar.feature1Desc: Advanced AI creates natural lip movements and facial expressions for lifelike results.
avatar.feature2Desc: Choose from various AI voices in different languages, or use your own audio.
avatar.feature3Desc: Upload your own image to create a personalized talking avatar.

urlToVideo.title: URL to Video
urlToVideo.heroSubtitle: Transform any blog post, article, or webpage into a professional video with AI-generated visuals, voiceover, and captions.
urlToVideo.processingMessage: Video is being generated. This may take several minutes...
urlToVideo.signInToGenerate: Sign in to convert URLs to videos
urlToVideo.feature1Desc: AI reads and understands your article, extracting key points for the video.
urlToVideo.feature2Desc: Automatically generate relevant images and scenes for each part of the content.
urlToVideo.feature3Desc: Get a ready-to-publish video with voiceover, captions, and background music.
